brand_identity.name: MakeMyDukaan
brand_identity.mission: Empowering Indian SMBs to own their digital future instantly.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, inputs, and UI elements. Relaxed leading.

primary.description: Deep Navy (Slate-900) for strong hierarchy and trust.

secondary.description: Vibrant Sky Blue (Sky-500) for primary actions.

accent.description: Teal (Teal-500) for growth indicators, success states, and highlights.

background.description: Pure white for clarity, cool gray for sections.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-24 for section padding.

grid_system.marketing_hero: Tetris Grid: Asymmetric 12-col grid. Text occupies 7 cols, Visuals occupy 5 cols.

glassmorphism.cards: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

micro_interactions.links: Underline expand from center or color shift to Teal.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle mesh gradients in light blue/teal opacity-10 for backgrounds. NO text gradients.

component_library.instructions: Use Shadcn components but override default rounded-md to rounded-xl for a friendlier SMB vibe. Use 'Sonner' for toasts.

special_components.name: WhatsAppButton
special_components.style: bg-[#25D366] text-white rounded-full p-4 shadow-lg hover:scale-110 transition-transform

hero_visual.alt: Modern office team working on digital solutions
hero_visual.usage: Hero section right side or background with overlay

target_audience_smb.usage: Why Go Digital / Target Audience section

service_web_dev.alt: Laptop with code on wooden table

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'lucide-react' for icons (Rocket, TrendingUp, Smartphone, Code).
Ensure the 'Get Quote' form sends data to a mock API endpoint.
The WhatsApp button must link to 'https://wa.me/9663112394'.
Portfolio page must use a Masonry or Grid layout for projects.
Pricing cards must highlight the 'Best Value' plan with a Teal border ring.
Use Tailwind's 'slate' scale for neutrals, NOT gray or zinc, to keep it cool and professional.
Ensure 'data-testid' is added to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do not apply universal transition 'transition: all'.
Do not center align the app container.
Use modern button styles (pill or sharp) with interaction animations.
